configuration.barrels.barrelName: Sets the file name for the generated barrel.
configuration.barrels.includeFiles: Configures which files to include when creating a file barrel.
configuration.barrels.ignore: Configures which files or directories to ignore when creating a barrel.
configuration.barrels.itemTemplate: Configure the item template used when a file/directory is processed.
configuration.barrels.headerTemplate: Configure the header template which indicates the start of a barrel.
configuration.barrels.footerTemplate: Configure the footer template which indicates the end of a barrel.
configuration.barrels.enableHeader: Whether the header template is used when creating a barrel.
configuration.barrels.enableFooter: Whether the footer template is used when creating a barrel.
configuration.title: NG42
